## [osrm R package](https://github.com/rCarto/osrm)

```{r,eval=F}
# https://github.com/rCarto/osrm
library("devtools")
install_github("osrm","rCarto")
```


```{r}
library(osrm)
data("com")
distCom <- osrmTable(loc = com[1:50, c("name","lon","lat")])
kable(distCom$duration[1:5,1:5])
```
